cars.description: This beauty is only one year old with a minute number of one owner. This vehicle has only but 3,000 miles on it and has a crushing 526 RWHP.

An American classic reborn. This brand new Chevrolet Corvette Z06 comes with 650 RWHP and is a sleek race-red with black accents inside and out. If you're looking for a white knuckle experience this car is for you.
The Hellcat is currently known as the most powerful muscle car straight off the lot with a massive 707 RWHP.
